alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 10:27PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Ulster, northwestern Dutchess and southwestern Columbia Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1027 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tillson, or near New Paltz, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingston, New Paltz, Hudson, Saugerties, Rhinebeck, Hurley, Claverack, Livingston, Copake, Clermont, Red Hook, Ancram, High Falls, Tillson, Saugerties South, Port Ewen, Claverack-Red Mills, Lake Katrine, Staatsburg and Lorenz Park. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 19 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess
